sentences.english: But the all these appear to have to be too quick and quickly make Yi snow suddenly tongue.
sentences.chinese: 可是这一切似乎来得太快，快的令伊雪乍舌。

sentences.english: Judy's ideas looked excellent at first blush.
sentences.chinese: 乍看起来，朱迪的主意好像极妙。

sentences.english: The statement accompanying the decision was, at first glance, hard nosed.
sentences.chinese: 乍看起来，这样的声明和决定是非常死板顽固的。

sentences.english: Immediately, the center of the galaxy looks incredibly fluffy.
sentences.chinese: 乍看起来，银河系中心似乎很蓬松。

sentences.english: Now probably this is hard to accept intuitively.
sentences.chinese: 乍一想这有点难以接受。

sentences.english: This is the postcode category of Amnat Charoen, Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 这是泰国安纳乍能府的邮政编码分类。

sentences.english: At first glance nothing seems to replicate in brain tissue.
sentences.chinese: 乍看起来，脑组织中似乎没有复制什么。

sentences.english: On the face of it, becoming an entrepreneur can sound scary.
sentences.chinese: 乍看起来，成为一名创业者可能令人提心吊胆。

sentences.english: That is older than most first timers.
sentences.chinese: 这是大多数初来乍以上。

sentences.english: Joyful Pet Veterinary Hospital, G/F, 183 Belcher's Street, West Point, Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 爱心宠物兽医医院，香港西环卑路乍街183号地下。

sentences.english: But at a glance, it certainly seems like a case of the fox guarding the henhouse.
sentences.chinese: 但乍看起来，这确实就像让狐狸看守鸡舍一样。

sentences.english: I see a prima facie reason for it.
At first glance, the half-dozen cars could pass for a wedding procession.
sentences.chinese: 乍眼瞅，这六辆小车可称得上一列婚典步队了。

sentences.english: Suddenly listen loose voice, alley Mo microscopic tiny one Zheng, immediately and fiercely turn round.
sentences.chinese: 乍听到松的声音，弄墨微微一怔，随即猛的转身。

sentences.english: An elusive greenish-yellow gleam flashes, then another.
sentences.chinese: 一丝绿里带黄的光芒乍闪即逝，接着又一丝。
